publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-3377 Irene McGugan: Scottish Football—That the Parliament notes with concern the current demise of Scottish football at both club and international levels; calls on the Scottish Executive to urgently obtain from the Scottish Football Association a detailed report confirming the current status of the report commissioned from Ernie Walker's Think-tank, including any aspects which have been implemented, areas outstanding and parts needing to be updated in view of changing events and circumstances, and further calls on the Executive to ensure that funding by it, either directly or indirectly, to football bodies and organisations is dependent on the report as updated being implemented in full and without further delay.
S1M-3377 Scottish Football (lodged on 10 September 2002) Richard Lochhead*, Alex Neil*
S1M-3377 Scottish Football (lodged on 10 September 2002) Mr Kenneth Gibson*, Michael Matheson*, Tommy Sheridan*

S1M-3377 Irene McGugan: Scottish Football—That the Parliament notes with concern the current demise of Scottish football at both club and international levels; calls on the Scottish Executive to urgently obtain from the Scottish Football Association a detailed report confirming the current status of the report commissioned from Ernie Walker's Think-tank, including any aspects which have been implemented, areas outstanding and parts needing to be updated in view of changing events and circumstances, and further calls on the Executive to ensure that funding by it, either directly or indirectly, to football bodies and organisations is dependent on the report as updated being implemented in full and without further delay.Supported by: Richard Lochhead, Alex Neil, Mr Kenneth Gibson, Michael Matheson, Tommy Sheridan
S1M-3377 Scottish Football (lodged on 10 September 2002) Andrew Wilson*, Mr Andrew Welsh*
S1M-3377 Scottish Football (lodged on 10 September 2002) Donald Gorrie*, Ms Sandra White*
S1M-3377 Scottish Football (lodged on 10 September 2002) Christine Grahame*
S1M-3377 Scottish Football (lodged on 10 September 2002) Brian Adam*
S1M-3377 Scottish Football (lodged on 10 September 2002) Tricia Marwick*, Mr Gil Paterson*
